member.name: T:Sias.Scale.SScaleDevice
member.summary:
Scale device
The Scale device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one sias scale module on a sias instrument.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_Scale
The interface includes - configuration properties for ... - layout properties for the scale slot - properties reflecting scale speeds and times - methods for starting and stopping the scale .

member.name: M:Sias.Scale.SScaleDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this will succeed it returns true. If it fails it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: true if attachable, false if not
